Posts.Content: Mar 2, 2015 11:47AM bbbbun wrote: My surgery was scheduled for tomorrow 3/2 however my precious 3 yo grandson's snuggles with his Bunnie resulted in bronchitis for me...wouldn't trade for the snuggles..... BUT called PS and they said no way.... so now I am scheduled for 6/2 arrgghhh (BUSY PS) the anesthesiologist's have a big problem with anything related to chest congestion because of pneumonia ....so so sorry for you! Better be safe!!! Blessings to you!!
Posts.Title: anyone have a cold just before surgery? windingshores AndreaJ50
